trans.tran_cn: 堤，排水沟，障碍物，女同性恋者
trans.tran_en: A dike is a thick wall that is built to stop water flooding onto very low-lying land from a river or from the ocean

trans.tran_cn: 筑堤防护；开沟排水（等于dyke）
